spData
  • Reference

sp_download

Retrieves external files from the spDataLarge package, based on functions from the externalrdata package https://github.com/jsta/externalrdata

sp_download(filenames, dest_folder = "data",
  baseurl = "https://github.com/Nowosad/spDataLarge/blob/master/inst/")

Arguments

filenames

names of files
dest_folder

destination folder (data/ by default)
baseurl

the url to download data from

Examples

not_run({
  sp_download(c("zion.gpkg", "landsat_b3.tif"))
})

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Examples
